section.title: About this guide
section.p: In this guide, we introduce the configuration settings needed to set up as LDAP server and provide configuration examples of Zoiper Softphone and mainstream IP phones like Yealink, Fanvil, Snom, Htek, Cisco, and Grandstream.

section.title: Audience
section.p: This guide is intended for the administrators who are responsible for setting up LDAP server and have a basic knowledge of LDAP.
